metadata.title: CVE-2021-37231 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-buffer-overflow occurs in Atomicparsley 20210124.204813.840499fthrough APar_readX() in src/util.cpp while parsing a crafted mp4 filebecause of the missing boundary check.

criterions.comment: atomicparsley: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
